info.name: random walk ( 244 chars )
info.description:
random walk ( cyclical, different config at each restart, can go fullscreen ).
Code golfing of [url]https://shadertoy.com/view/4dVXWz[/url]

renderpass.code:
// code golfing of https://shadertoy.com/view/4dVXWz  ( 458 chars )
void mainImage(out vec4 O, vec2 u) { mi }
renderpass.name: Image

renderpass.code: void mainImage(out vec4 O, vec2 u) { mi }
renderpass.name: Buffer A

renderpass.code:
#define r fract( 3e4 * sin( (U+iTime) * mat2(1,13.51,73.37,-57.17) ) ) //
#define T texture( iChannel0, fract( U / iResolution.xy ) )            //
#define mi                                                              \
    vec2 U = u, d;                                                      \
    iFrame < 1 && r.x > .999 ? O++ : O = T * .99;                       \
    for ( int k = -1 ; ++k < 9 ;                                        \
          sign( .5 - r ) == d * T.x ? O = T : O )                       \
        d = vec2( k%3 , k/3 ),                                          \
        U = u + --d;
renderpass.name: Common
